creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: coarse woven white cotton; top, front and back have supplementary weft silk designs including animals; some areas are embroidered over with green and yellow cotton threads forming diamonds; color areas are a secondary, supplementary weft; original color of silk was light mauve; slit neck and 6 3/4" of center seam stitched with silk; PL piece shorter than PR
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
